🔥 Fireplace Repair by Zaricci

Expert Restoration for Gas, Electric & Luxury Designer Fireplaces

A fireplace is more than a heat source — it’s a centerpiece of ambiance, design, and comfort. When it stops working, you need a specialist who understands both form and function. At Zaricci, we specialize in fireplace repair for luxury estates, modern residences, and custom architectural installations.

From gas and electric fireplaces to high-end linear and glass models, we restore warmth and elegance to your home — all with white-glove professionalism.

🛠️ Repairing the Most Prestigious Fireplace Brands

Zaricci’s certified technicians are trained in servicing sophisticated fireplace systems, including:

  • Mendota
  • Heat & Glo
  • Napoleon
  • Valor
  • Regency
  • Lopi
  • Majestic
  • Fireplace Xtrordinair
  • Town & Country
  • European Home
  • Kozy Heat
  • Dimplex
  • Ortal
  • Stûv
  • Rasmussen
  • Spark Modern Fires

Whether your fireplace is a centerpiece in a contemporary Bel Air home or integrated into a traditional Brentwood estate, we preserve its design while restoring its function.

🔍 Common Fireplace Issues We Repair

  • Pilot light won’t stay lit
  • Gas not igniting or delayed ignition
  • Unusual smell or flickering flame
  • Remote control or wall switch not working
  • Blower motor noisy or nonfunctional
  • Glass fogging, discoloration, or cracking
  • Thermostat or smart system not responding
  • Electric fireplace not turning on or heating

🌟 Why Choose Zaricci for Fireplace Repair?

  • Same-Day Luxury Fireplace Repair in most high-end areas
  • Licensed Gas & Electric Fireplace Technicians
  • No Subcontractors — all in-house, certified pros
  • Genuine Manufacturer Parts to maintain performance
  • Respectful In-Home Service with clean, quiet technicians
  • Custom Solutions for complex fireplace installs or concealed vents

🧰 Fireplace Maintenance for Luxury Homes

Keep your fireplace running beautifully with seasonal tune-ups that include burner cleaning, pilot assembly checks, vent inspections, and control testing. Our maintenance plans are tailored to premium brands and designer installations, ensuring year-round performance and safety.
